vulnerabilities.details: Application is using HTTP instead of HTTPS
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement HTTPS across the entire application and use HSTS headers
Implement HTTPS across the entire application and use HSTS headers

A01.name: Broken Access Control
A01.description: Access control enforces policy such that users cannot act outside of their intended permissions.

testResults.name: Check for public access to admin interfaces
testResults.description: Attempts to access admin interfaces without authentication
testResults.remediation: Ensure all admin interfaces require proper authentication and authorization

testResults.name: Check for horizontal privilege escalation
testResults.description: Tests if users can access resources belonging to other users of the same permission level
testResults.remediation: Implement proper resource-based access control and validate user context for each request
